content.prompt: The conditions in Russia described in the passage were most directly the result of which of the following?

choices.label: The resistance of many aristocrats to efforts to reform the Russian economy

topic.text: 6.3: Second Wave Industrialization and Its Effects

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
